text: [Music]
hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a super simple very sexy penne
pasta with golden cherry tomato sauce
this is the perfect solution to that end
to summer dilemma
what the heck do i do with all these
cherry tomatoes cherry tomatoes are
great sweet beautiful but they just
explode at the end of the season and you
have so many don't know what to do with
so this simple sauce is a great idea
incredibly delicious so check it out so
take a couple cups of cherry tomatoes
pull off the green things those aren't
edible throw them in a saucepan I got
mostly gold that look orange and then a
few red so this is mostly gold some gold
really sweet beautiful tomato but this
works with any ripe cherry tomato
alright I sliced a couple cloves of
garlic threw it in with a big pinch of
salt and a couple gloves of olive oil a
couple tablespoons and I'm going to
saute that over medium-low heat just
until the garlic barely begins to toast
I don't want to brown the garlic but I
also don't want it you know pure white
so that cooked for maybe two three
minutes in the oil and the garlic just
again the slightest bit of toastiness
around the edges then I'm going to add
to cover chicken stock alright so a
couple cups of chicken stock
bring that to a simmer and cook that for
about ten minutes or until the tomatoes
start to collapse
now one safety tip here if you have time
you can pop the cherry tomatoes with a
paring knife before you throw them in
the pot sometimes they explode sometimes
they pop kind of adds the excitement of
the dish so I don't pop them but you
might want to alright I'm going to add a
couple shakes of red pepper flakes and
to finish a couple tablespoons of fresh
oregano right from the garden and you
know what if you don't have a garden
well actually you don't need a garden
plant herbs plant some herbs but if you
don't have a garden fresh oregano from
the store will do but you know what you
got to pay for that stuff we're going to
blend this till a smooth puree is formed
you can do this in a blender but these
stick blenders are so convenient by the
way make sure you tilt the pan so you
got enough to blend otherwise it flies
all over and then the finish I boiled
one package for
13 ounces of penne pasta I drained it
and I poured over that amazingly
beautiful golden cherry tomato sauce
fresh tasting beautiful tangy sweet with
the garlic and a little herb hint
they're so so delicious and just like
you're finishing a risotto go ahead and
stir it with a wooden spoon for a minute
or two keep it moving
so the pasta kind of absorbs a little
bit of that sauce if you just throw it
in the penne at the bottom gets the good
stuff okay go ahead and stir in your
cheese all the amounts are on the site
as usual and now of course you know at
this point you're going to taste and
adjust the seasoning so I put another
little you know sprinkling of salt you
might need it you might not you might
want to give a little more pepper flake
up to you to finish if you don't need
any more instructions put it in a bowl
sprinkle over some cheese and eat it
normally I'd use a fork but when I
looked at this bowl it just was kind of
saying use it use a spoon buddy please
use a spoon this time and I did and it
was amazing
so delicious I know somewhere very close
to you there are lots of cherry tomatoes
growing good excuse to talk to the
neighbor over the fence that you know
you haven't talked to since he caught
you taking his newspaper patched things
up get some cherry tomatoes so you can
make this delicious simple and like I
said pretty sexy pasta dish anyway hope
you give this a try go to food wishes
com to get all the ingredients there's
like three of them and as always enjoy
[Music]
